post.description: Authenticates a user using email and password, returns a token (user ID)

200.description: Login successful, returns token and user ID

post.description: Registers a new user with an email, password, and name.

parameters.description: User registration credentials. Email must be unique. Password must be at least 8 characters long.
parameters.name: register

409.description: User with this email already exists

get.description: Retrieves the list of friends for the authenticated user based on the token
get.summary: Get list of friends for a user

200.description: List of friends

get.description: Retrieve all friend requests received by the authenticated user

200.description: List of friend requests ordered by date received

get.description: Retrieve all friend requests sent by the authenticated user

200.description: List of friend requests ordered by date sent

put.description: Accept a friend request from another user

parameters.description: User ID of the friend request sender
parameters.name: id

post.description: Allows a user to add another user as a friend by their user ID

parameters.description: User ID of the friend to be added
parameters.name: id

409.description: User cannot add themselves as a friend

delete.description: Delete a friend request by user ID

parameters.description: User ID of the friend request sender
parameters.name: id

delete.description: Deletes a friend based on the provided friend ID from the URL and the user's token from the header
delete.summary: Delete a friend from the user's friend list

get.description: Returns a list of GPX files associated with the authenticated user(File size is represented in Bytes)

200.description: gpx_files

post.description: Uploads a GPX file for the authenticated user. The file must be sent as form-data with the key 'file'.

parameters.description: Title for the GPX file(max 64 characters)
parameters.name: title

201.description: File id of the uploaded GPX file

get.description: Returns a list of GPX files that the authenticated user has saved

200.description: gpx_files

get.description: Retrieve information about a specific GPX file by its ID. You can see track only if it's public, you are the owner or you are a member of the group that include it.

200.description: Gpx file information

delete.description: Deletes a file by its ID from both the database and the disk

get.description: Retrieves a file based on the provided file ID and authorization token
get.summary: Download a GPX file by ID

200.description: Returns the signed URL for the GPX file

get.description: Get a map file by its ID
get.summary: Get a map file by ID

200.description: Returns the signed URL for the map file

patch.description: Set is_public to true or false

200.description: File privacy updated successfully

put.description: Save a GPX track to the user's saved tracks

200.description: Track saved successfully

delete.description: Remove a track from the user's saved tracks

200.description: Track saved successfully

get.description: Get all groups for the authenticated user

200.description: List of groups

post.description: Creates a new group for the authenticated user

parameters.description: Group information. Fields: description (required, max 64 characters), file_id (optional, must be a valid file ID)
parameters.name: group

get.description: Get group information by group ID
get.summary: Get group information by group ID

200.description: Group information. Includes group description, created_by, created_at, list of members, and file information(-1 if no files are associated with the group).

delete.description: Deletes a group based on the provided group ID from the URL and the user's token from the header

403.description: Forbidden - User is not the leader of the group

patch.description: Updates the GPX file for a group session.

parameters.description: File ID of the GPX file to be used for the group
parameters.name: file_id

delete.description: Allows a user to leave a group by providing their group ID or remove a user from the group if the user is the leader.
delete.summary: Leave a group using group ID

parameters.description: If provided, the user with this ID will be removed from the group if the authenticated user is the leader
parameters.name: user_id

get.description: Get members information by group ID
get.summary: Get members information of a group

200.description: List of members in the group

put.description: Updates the user location(latitude, longitude, altitude, accuracy) and help request status in a group.

parameters.description: Location data for the user in the group. GoingTo is optional.
parameters.name: location

put.description: Allows a user to join a group by providing their group ID
put.summary: Join a group using group ID

201.description: User successfully added to the group

403.description: Only group leader can add members

get.description: Fetches the profile information of the user based on the provided token in the Authorization header

200.description: User profile information

delete.description: Deletes the user profile based on the provided authorization token.

put.description: Uploads a profile image for the authenticated user. The image must be sent as form-data with the key 'file'. It must be an image file (jpg, jpeg, png) and should not exceed 5MB in size.

get.description: Searches for GPX tracks by title
get.summary: Search for GPX tracks by title

200.description: Returns a list of GPX tracks matching the search query ordered by upload date.

parameters.description: Search for friends only (optional, true/false, default is false)
parameters.name: friendsOnly

200.description: Returns a list of users matching the search query ordered by username. State is set to -1 if the user is not a friend, 0 if there is a request sent, and 1 if the user is a friend.

get.description: Retrieve the profile image of a user by their ID.
get.summary: Get profile image of a user

parameters.description: User ID to retrieve profile image for
parameters.name: id

200.description: Returns the signed URL for the profile image

get.description: Retrieves all tracks associated with a given user ID.
get.summary: Get tracks of a specific user

200.description: Returns the list of tracks for the user
